sense.def: Alternative Writing sun shang 損傷.

Pathological Condition of all types of bodily injuries, including damaged tissue or functions of the skin and flesh, sinews and bones, as well as organs, inflicted by harmful external causes or pharmaceutical effects, or resulting from an improper lifestyle, with major signs including pain and functional impairment. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry bai jiao 白 膠：療吐血下血，崩中不止，四肢酸疼，多汗淋露，折跌傷損 , “It cures blood spitting and blood discharge, unending collapsing center, sour pain affecting the four limbs, profuse sweating and dripping [like] dew drops, as well as injuries resulting from fracturing [a bone] and falls”.
